titles: An elegy upon the death of that renowned Prince Rupert. Who departed this life on Wednesday, Novemb. 29. 1682.
publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Rainbow, near St. Andrews-Church, in Holbourn,
notes: Verse: "Ah! Cruel death, what hast thou lately done? ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting text and imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Rupert, --  Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
